author: Edmondo De Amicis
quote: A woman is always a mystery: one must not be fooled by her face and her hearts inspiration.

author: Margaret Anderson
quote: I defied nothing at all. I ignored the law because I didn't know it existed. It didn't occur to me that anyone would want to curb my inspiration.

author: Jean Anouilh
quote: Inspiration is a farce that poets have invented to give themselves importance.

author: Joan Armatrading
quote: Inspiration doesn't really work like that - you're not looking out for it. Inspiration is something that tends to capture you rather than you capture it.

author: Joan Armatrading
quote: So, the combination of looking at lots of different people and how they react to each other and how they relate to each other and waiting for that inspiration is the thing that allows me to keep writing.

author: Colleen Atwood
quote: I'd seen the current stage production and the 1975 production of Chicago. I liked them both very much, but I didn't use them necessarily as inspiration.

author: Cecilia Bartoli
quote: Actually, I feel music becoming more and more important. It's a big source of inspiration. With what's going on in the world, we feel almost desperate. Music also brings you peace.

author: Charles Baudelaire
quote: Let us beware of common folk, of common sense, of sentiment, of inspiration, and of the obvious.
keywords: Inspiration, Common sense, Folk, Obvious, Sentiment

author: Charles Baudelaire
quote: Inspiration comes of working every day.

author: Birch Bayh
quote: Certainly I think the election of John Kennedy and all he stood for was one that really was an inspiration.

author: Beck
quote: You have to shelve a lot of your inspiration. There's only so much you can do with one record.

author: Vissarion Belinsky
quote: Do not worry about the incarnation of ideas. If you are a poet, your works will contain them without your knowledge'they will be both moral and national if you follow your inspiration freely.

author: Ruth Benedict
quote: I long to speak out the intense inspiration that comes to me from the lives of strong women.

author: Bo Bennett
quote: Enthusiasm is excitement with inspiration, motivation, and a pinch of creativity.

author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer
quote: The essence of optimism is that it takes no account of the present, but it is a source of inspiration, of vitality and hope where others have resigned; it enables a man to hold his head high, to claim the future for himself and not to abandon it to his enemy.
keywords: Inspiration, Hope, Optimism, Enemy, Future, Man, Present, Vitality

author: Christian Nestell Bovee
quote: Enthusiasm is the inspiration of everything great. Without it no man is to be feared, and with it none despised.

author: Johannes Brahms
quote: Without craftsmanship, inspiration is a mere reed shaken in the wind.

author: Georg Brandes
quote: But I did not find any positive inspiration in my studies until I approached my nineteenth year.

author: Robert Bresson
quote: When you do not know what you are doing and what you are doing is the best - that is inspiration.

author: Eric Brown
quote: The inspiration to write? Perhaps it's not so much inspiration, as a NEED to write. I get itchy and guilty and dissatisfied when I haven't written for a while. Ideas come to me and need to be written down.

author: Rita Mae Brown
quote: A deadline is negative inspiration. Still, it's better than no inspiration at all.

author: Pearl S. Buck
quote: The person who tries to live alone will not succeed as a human being. His heart withers if it does not answer another heart. His mind shrinks away if he hears only the echoes of his own thoughts and finds no other inspiration.
keywords: Heart, Inspiration, Thoughts, Being, Mind, Succeed, Will

author: Amanda Burton
quote: I always start from scratch with a character - they're never based on anyone else. You get ideas of what people look like, and I'm a great people watcher. You can draw inspiration from people.

author: Carter Burwell
quote: The flow of Guiness into the studio was inspirational as well as nutritive.

author: Nolan Bushnell
quote: The ultimate inspiration is the deadline.

author: Rocco Buttiglione
quote: One needs to know what the hierarchy of values are from which one takes inspiration, and in a democratic society this is the subject of continuous democratic debate.

author: Meg Cabot
quote: My original inspiration was my mom: a few years after the death of my dad, she started dating one my teachers!

author: Eileen Caddy
quote: Cease trying to work everything out with your minds. It will get you nowhere. Live by intuition and inspiration and let your whole life be Revelation.
keywords: Life, Work, Inspiration, Intuition, Trying, Will

author: Italo Calvino
quote: What Romantic terminology called genius or talent or inspiration is nothing other than finding the right road empirically, following one's nose, taking shortcuts.
keywords: Talent, Genius, Inspiration, Nothing, Right, Road, Romantic

author: Benjamin Cardozo
quote: Method is much, technique is much, but inspiration is even more.

author: Thomas Carper
quote: For me, our beaches have always been a source of personal inspiration.

author: Emily Carr
quote: Oh, Spring! I want to go out and feel you and get inspiration. My old things seem dead. I want fresh contacts, more vital searching.

author: Jim Carrey
quote: Before I do anything, I think, well what hasn't been seen. Sometimes, that turns out to be something ghastly and not fit for society. And sometimes that inspiration becomes something that's really worthwhile.

author: Michael N. Castle
quote: Just the example Delaware State University graduates set by the way they live their lives, should be an inspiration to other high school students to go to Delaware State.
keywords: Inspiration, Example, School, State, Students, University

author: Nick Cave
quote: An artist's duty is rather to stay open-minded and in a state where he can receive information and inspiration. You always have to be ready for that little artistic Epiphany.
keywords: Inspiration, Artist, Duty, Information, Open, State

author: Emanuel Celler
quote: Roosevelt's humor was broad, his manner friendly. Of wit there was little; of philosophy, none. What did he possess? Intuition, inspiration, love of adventure.
keywords: Humor, Love, Inspiration, Adventure, Intuition, Philosophy, Wit

author: Jimmy Chamberlin
quote: My brother was always in bands and on the road when I was a kid and he was my inspiration. He never made it with a big band, in fact he never made a record. Here he is fifty-something years old.
keywords: Brother, Inspiration, Fact, Old, Road, Years

author: Tracy Chapman
quote: After it's finished, sometimes I can trace a path that goes back to the possible source of inspiration.

author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
quote: Youth is the period in which a man can be hopeless. The end of every episode is the end of the world. But the power of hoping through everything, the knowledge that the soul survives its adventures, that great inspiration comes to the middle-aged.
keywords: Power, Soul, Knowledge, Inspiration, End, Man, World, Youth

author: Winston Churchill
quote: I always seem to get inspiration and renewed vitality by contact with this great novel land of yours which sticks up out of the Atlantic.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: We shall draw from the heart of suffering itself the means of inspiration and survival.

author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
quote: No one was ever great without some portion of divine inspiration.

author: Jackie Collins
quote: I think I'm a born storyteller. Inspiration is all around me. I can read a newspaper article and come up with an idea for a book.

author: Judy Collins
quote: When inspiration does not come, I go for a walk, go to the movie, talk to a friend, let go... The muse is bound to return again, especially if I turn my back!

author: Judy Collins
quote: I have inspiration and feelings of being alive most every day I live.

author: James Connolly
quote: Just as it is true that a stream cannot rise above its source, so it is true that a national literature cannot rise above the moral level of the social conditions of the people from whom it derives its inspiration.

author: Aaron Copland
quote: Inspiration may be a form of super-consciousness, or perhaps of subconsciousness I wouldn't know. But I am sure it is the antithesis of self-consciousness.

author: Deborah Cox
quote: I really think about the times that I've been through with my husband and all the stuff that we've been through together, and I think to those moments for inspiration for the role.

author: Deborah Cox
quote: I think the inspiration came from the fans. Whenever I'm online or whenever I get a chance to really communicate with the fans and the audience, they always say that they would love to have all of the remixes on one CD.

author: Cheryl Crawford
quote: Lee's great gifts are teaching and inspirational guidance, not administration and management.

author: Wilford O. Cross
quote: Man does not bring to God's altar the stuff of nature in itself, in its initial structure, but something he has made and molded out of nature for the nourishment and the inspiration of men.

author: Andrew Cuomo
quote: I believe we need to attract a new generation of the best and brightest to public service and I believe that government can be a source of inspiration, not degradation.

author: Billy Ray Cyrus
quote: The people at the record company had asked me if I could write a song about my life, my relationship with God, and where I'm from. Well, I can't write a song on purpose, my songs come in a moment of inspiration or desperation.
keywords: God, Life, People, Inspiration, Purpose, Company, Desperation, Song, Songs

author: Ram Dass
quote: Inspiration is God making contact with itself.

author: John Davidson
quote: I don't know why people are so surprised by my live performances. My approach is so simple; every song I sing, every story I tell, every move I make, must move the audience to laughter, tears or inspiration. Otherwise, why should I do it?

author: Taylor Dayne
quote: My tastes and inspirational artists were always rather eclectic and diverse.

author: Don DeLillo
quote: I felt Joyce was an influence on my fiction, but in a very general way, as a kind of inspiration and a model for the beauty of language.

author: Jackie DeShannon
quote: I would think, to me, growing up in the south, growing up with all the gospel music, singing in the church and having that rhythm and blues - the blues background was my big inspiration.
keywords: Music, Inspiration, Church, Growing up, Singing

author: Neil Diamond
quote: I came back to performing with a different attitude about performing and myself. I wasn't expecting perfection any more, just hoping for an occasional inspiration.

author: Willie Dixon
quote: The Blues are the true facts of life expressed in words and song, inspiration, feeling, and understanding.
keywords: Life, Inspiration, Facts, Feeling, Song, Understanding, Words

author: Roma Downey
quote: This CD became something of a personal journey for me. The tone of the whole CD is uplifting and inspirational. It's an upper. We have enough downers in the world.

author: Patty Duke
quote: Human beings have speculated about the relationship between inspiration and insanity for centuries.

author: Fred Durst
quote: My life. The life I'm living that's where all my inspiration comes from. Real life experiences.

author: Thomas A. Edison
quote: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.

author: Thomas A. Edison
quote: His genius he was quite content in one brief sentence to define; Of inspiration one percent, of perspiration, ninety nine.

author: Elizabeth II
quote: To what greater inspiration and counsel can we turn than to the imperishable truth to be found in this treasure house, the Bible?

author: Herb Elliott
quote: It is the inspiration of the Olympic Games that drives people not only to compete but to improve, and to bring lasting spiritual and moral benefits to the athlete and inspiration to those lucky enough to witness the athletic dedication.
keywords: People, Inspiration, Benefits, Dedication, Games, Spiritual

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: It is a fact often observed, that men have written good verses under the inspiration of passion, who cannot write well under other circumstances.

author: Robert Englund
quote: I always get inspiration from whatever characters say about my character.

author: Arthur Erickson
quote: Inspiration in Science may have to do with ideas, but not in Art. In art it is in the senses that are instinctively responsive to the medium of expression.
keywords: Art, Science, Inspiration, Ideas, Expression, May, Senses

author: Kevin Eubanks
quote: Inspiration is one thing and you can't control it, but hard work is what keeps the ship moving. Good luck means, work hard. Keep up the good work.
keywords: Work, Inspiration, Control, Hard work, Luck

author: Bob Filner
quote: Rosa Parks' courage, determination, and tenacity continue to be an inspiration to all those committed to non-violent protest and change nearly half a century later.
keywords: Change, Inspiration, Courage, Determination, Protest, Tenacity

author: Carly Fiorina
quote: My mother taught me about the power of inspiration and courage, and she did it with a strength and a passion that I wish could be bottled.
keywords: Power, Mother, Inspiration, Courage, Strength, Passion

author: Ella Fitzgerald
quote: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.

author: Eddie Floyd
quote: The groups, though, were my inspiration way back then. I liked Frankie Lyman and the Teenagers.

author: Shelby Foote
quote: Most of my inspiration, if that's the word, came from books themselves.

author: Lukas Foss
quote: In the nineteenth century the more grandiose word inspiration began to replace the word idea in the arts.

author: E. Franklin Frazier
quote: Education in the past has been too much inspiration and too little information.

author: Bill Frist
quote: Education brings about opportunity, and in turn inspiration.

author: Nomar Garciaparra
quote: My inspiration was the game itself, not any individual player in it.

author: Stephen Gardiner
quote: Human requirements are the inspiration for art.

author: Stephen Gardiner
quote: The exterior cannot do without the interior since it is from this, as from life, that it derives much of its inspiration and character.

author: Teri Garr
quote: I have worked enough and I am happy to be touring the country speaking about living with MS to give people inspiration and motivation to help themselves.
keywords: Motivation, People, Inspiration, Country, Help, Living

author: Jose Ortega y Gasset
quote: Better beware of notions like genius and inspiration; they are a sort of magic wand and should be used sparingly by anybody who wants to see things clearly.

author: Robin Gibb
quote: Everyone's looking to the urban scene for inspiration now.

author: Robin Gibb
quote: When Maurice touched a keyboard, it was like something from a movie, magical. He would always give you something from a movie, and you'd go, what did you just play... immediately inspirational writings, amazing. That's what we're going to miss.

author: Beth Gibbons
quote: The music comes first. When Geoff has made something the inspiration comes automatically. His music is very expressive. But still is is a very difficult process: I have to add something to his music, not push it away. It has to be equal, and I find that very difficult.

author: Tom Glazer
quote: For hundreds of years people have talked about artists having inspiration, but often, some persons would say, write us a symphony or write us a song, on commission. The artists would come up with a masterpiece without waiting to have their muse inspire them.
keywords: People, Inspiration, Artists, Song, Waiting, Years

author: Vincent Van Gogh
quote: Do not quench your inspiration and your imagination; do not become the slave of your model.

author: Juan Goytisolo
quote: The writer cannot abandon himself simply to inspiration, and feign innocence vis a vis language, because language is never innocent.

author: Joe Grant
quote: What is he? He's a puppeteer and he's got a lot of inspiration all around him, and the fact that they can manipulate the expressions now with ease compared to what it used to be.

author: Colin Greenwood
quote: Motion Picture Soundtrack on Kid A was another Coltrane inspiration.

author: Bede Griffiths
quote: The inspiration came suddenly again to surrender to the Mother. It was quite unexpected: And so somehow I made a surrender to the Mother. Then I had an experience of overwhelming love. Waves of love sort of flowed into me.

author: Daryl Hannah
quote: I'd like to provide information, inspiration, and access to whatever goods and services are needed to make it super easy for everyone to change their lifestyle to a sustainable one.

author: Ben Harper
quote: If it comes out sounding like Dixieland jazz or classical or punk or rock or even slightly metal, that's because that's where I'm going to find inspiration.

author: Frank Harris
quote: The Christian churches were offered two things: the spirit of Jesus and the idiotic morality of Paul, and they rejected the higher inspiration... Following Paul, we have turned the goodness of love into a fiend and degraded the crowning impulse of our being into a capital sin.
keywords: Love, Morality, Inspiration, Christian, Being, Churches, Goodness, Sin, Spirit

author: John Michael Hayes
quote: Where does a man get inspiration to write a song like that? Well, he gets it from the landlady once a month.

author: Lafcadio Hearn
quote: Accordingly the Northern races of Europe found their inspiration in the Bible; and the enthusiasm for it has not yet quite faded away.

author: Brad Henry
quote: Families are the compass that guide us. They are the inspiration to reach great heights, and our comfort when we occasionally falter.

author: Eugen Herrigel
quote: He grows daily more capable of following any inspiration without technical effort, and also of letting inspiration come to him through meticulous observation.

author: Thor Heyerdahl
quote: Civilization grew in the beginning from the minute that we had communication - particularly communication by sea that enabled people to get inspiration and ideas from each other and to exchange basic raw materials.
keywords: People, Civilization, Inspiration, Ideas, Beginning, Communication, Sea

author: Utada Hikaru
quote: In English, the sounds and melodies I created were an inspiration to me, and words came to me as I explored the sounds, and from there I was able expand on the meaning.

author: Ken Hill
quote: Sometimes just getting out of the house and doing something you haven't done in a long time (or never done!) can open up the doors to musical inspiration.

author: John Huston
quote: What to do when inspiration doesn't come; be careful not to spook, get the wind up, force things into position. You must wait around until the idea comes.

author: Enrique Iglesias
quote: My inspiration are the woman, friendship, and loneliness.

author: Josefa Iloilo
quote: We need to reach that happy stage of our development when differences and diversity are not seen as sources of division and distrust, but of strength and inspiration.

author: Guillermo Cabrera Infante
quote: I do not believe in inspiration, but I must have a title in order to work, otherwise I am lost.

author: Robert Green Ingersoll
quote: The inspiration of the Bible depends upon the ignorance of the gentleman who reads it.

author: Donnie Iris
quote: I get a lot of inspiration from the audience feedback to our live shows.

author: Charles Ives
quote: Every great inspiration is but an experiment.

author: Wanda Jackson
quote: Getting comments like that from even the young people at the shows who probably aren't singers, the girls who just tell me that I'm an inspiration to them, for one reason or another.

author: Arne Jacobsen
quote: But inspiration? - That's when you come home from abroad and are asked: Well, have you found inspiration? - and fortunately you haven't. But the impressions sink in, of course, and may emerge later: None of us has invented the house; that was done many thousands of years ago.

author: Wyclef Jean
quote: I know that the nice shines I have on is going to pass. The nice cars will pass. All that will stay is the music and the work. That's where I get the inspiration to help people out and work.
keywords: Music, Work, People, Inspiration, Help, Will

author: Billy Joel
quote: Don't make music for some vast, unseen audience or market or ratings share or even for something as tangible as money. Though it's crucial to make a living, that shouldn't be your inspiration. Do it for yourself.

author: Eyvind Johnson
quote: From the throes of inspiration and the eddies of thought the poet may at last be able to arrive at, and convey the right admixture of words and meaning.
keywords: Thought, Inspiration, May, Meaning, Right, Words

author: Elena Kagan
quote: I owe a debt of gratitude to two other living Justices. Sandra Day O'Connor and Ruth Bader Ginsburg paved the way for me and so many other women in my generation. Their pioneering lives have created boundless possibilities for women in the law. I thank them for their inspiration and also for the personal kindnesses they have shown me.
keywords: Women, Gratitude, Inspiration, Day, Debt, Law, Living, Possibilities

author: Anil Kapoor
quote: Not exactly but I get inspiration from stories which are unconventional.

author: Jeffrey Katzenberg
quote: Inspiration comes from all different places.

author: Maynard James Keenan
quote: I just hope that our fans are people who are inspired by music, and just use our music as a background or inspiration for whatever it is they do.

author: Thomas Keller
quote: The book is there for inspiration and as a foundation, the fundamentals on which to build.

author: Alicia Keys
quote: It's not until I hear songs that I've done, that I realize how much of an inspiration music from the '60s and '70s has been.

author: Lil' Kim
quote: It was a very emotional dinner... Everyone shared personal stories about her and gave her words of encouragement and inspiration. Everyone tried to remain positive.

author: Peter King
quote: I support mosques, obviously. We need churches, temples, mosques. Whatever people use to speak with their god or to receive spiritual inspiration is good for the country. But the symbolism of it at ground zero, within two blocks or three blocks, I believe is wrong.
keywords: God, People, Inspiration, Churches, Country, Spiritual, Support, Wrong

author: Richard King
quote: If a violent act towards a woman takes place, and the inspiration for that act is violence in cinema, the inspiration for that act would have come from somewhere else if movies didn't exist.
keywords: Movies, Inspiration, Act, Cinema, Violence, Woman

author: Naomi Klein
quote: When Nike says, just do it, that's a message of empowerment. Why aren't the rest of us speaking to young people in a voice of inspiration?

author: Beyonce Knowles
quote: Diana Ross is a big inspiration to all of us. We all grew up watching everything about her - her mike placement, her grace, her style and her class.

author: John Kricfalusi
quote: The only character I ever remember actually creating in a flash of inspiration was George Liquor. God planted that in my head in an instant.

author: Talib Kweli
quote: So I just had to step up how I was doing it and the moment that I stepped up and the moment I focused all my energy on that is when things started to happen. So there's a direct relationship between my inspiration and my output.

author: Lactantius
quote: The prophets, who were very many, proclaim and declare the one God; for, being filled with the inspiration of the one God, they predicted things to come, with agreeing and harmonious voice.

author: Karl Lagerfeld
quote: Yes, and I can sit down on a white piece of paper and work because I don't believe too much into inspiration, only I'm waiting for inspiration, work and then inspiration may come. It's a little too easy to say that.

author: James Larkin
quote: We are now on the threshold of a newer movement, with a newer hope and a new inspiration.

author: Jude Law
quote: Personally speaking there's only so long you can go from film to film to film. There's an inspiration an actor gets from the stage.

author: Ang Lee
quote: Directing, I get all kinds of inspiration. It's working with people. It's a lot more fun.

author: Madeleine L'Engle
quote: Inspiration usually comes during work, rather than before it.

author: Julian Lennon
quote: My dad's music was a great inspiration to me.

author: Sean Lennon
quote: For me, songwriting is something I have to do ritually. I don't just wait for inspiration; I try to write a little bit every day.

author: Alex Lifeson
quote: I think that's given inspiration to other musicians. I know, particularly through the 90s, a lot of bands would cite Rush as an influence. I don't think it was so much our music, but more the way we really stuck to our guns.

author: Charles de Lint
quote: One expected growth, change; without it, the world was less, the well of inspiration dried up, the muses fled.

author: Franz Liszt
quote: Inspiration is enough to give expression to the tone in singing, especially when the song is without words.

author: Robert Lloyd
quote: I don't really care who gets their inspiration from where, it's the end results that count.

author: Jack London
quote: You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club.

author: Seth Low
quote: From you we have learned what we, at least, value, to separate Church and State; and from you we gather inspiration at all times in our devotion to learning, to religious liberty, and to individual and National freedom.
keywords: Inspiration, Church, Devotion, Freedom, Learning, Liberty, Religious, State, Value

author: George Lucas
quote: 'Star Wars' is fun, its exciting, its inspirational, and people respond to that. It's what they want.

author: Hugh MacDiarmid
quote: It is time we in Scotland put England in its proper place and instead of our leaning on England and taking inspiration from her, we should lean and turn to Europe, for it is there our future prosperity lies.
keywords: Time, Inspiration, EnglEurope, Future, Lies, Prosperity, Scotland

author: Barry Mann
quote: If I waited for inspiration every time I sat down to write a song I probably would be a plumber today.

author: Page McConnell
quote: Every piece has its own identity which we develop by the rule 'We know no limits.' We follow the inspiration of the moment and don't worry if what we're playing is alternative, progressive or fusion rock.

author: William McKinley
quote: That's all a man can hope for during his lifetime - to set an example - and when he is dead, to be an inspiration for history.

author: Thia Megia
quote: I would love to meet Kelly Clarkson and if I get the chance to I would tell her thank you so much for the inspiration.

author: Arthur Middleton
quote: Times have changed since George Herbert... but the principle and spirit in which he ministered as a priest remains an inspiration and model for all priests.

author: Maria Mitchell
quote: We travel to learn; and I have never been in any country where they did not do something better than we do it, think some thoughts better than we think, catch some inspiration from heights above our own.

author: Maria Mitchell
quote: I have never been in any country where they did not do something better than we do it, think some thoughts better than we think, catch some inspiration from heights above our own.

author: William Henry Moody
quote: The very air in which you live is an inspiration.

author: Alberto Moravia
quote: When I sit at my table to write, I never know what it's going to be until I'm under way. I trust in inspiration, which sometimes comes and sometimes doesn't. But I don't sit back waiting for it. I work every day.

author: Ikue Mori
quote: The way I create music is maybe like a painting, to compose in a more visual way. Basically it's the music that I want to hear- that's my inspiration and bottom line. I just try to get ideas from books, movies, paintings.
keywords: Music, Movies, Inspiration, Ideas, Books, Painting, Want

author: Van Morrison
quote: When I started studying tenor saxophone as a kid in Belfast, I did so with a guy named George Cassidy, who was also a big inspiration.

author: Rob Morrow
quote: I'd like to think that the notion of inspiration will transcend cultural things that are going on. There's something classic about this movie that I'm hoping reaches kids.

author: Robert Motherwell
quote: If you can't find your inspiration by walking around the block one time, go around two blocks-but never three.

author: Graeme Murphy
quote: I look at the dancers and I get the inspiration for the work from them.

author: Ernest Newman
quote: Beethoven, Wagner, Bach, and Mozart settled down day after day to the job in hand. They didn't waste time waiting for inspiration.
keywords: Time, Inspiration, Day, Job, Waiting, Waste

author: Marc Newson
quote: If somebody asked me about my inspiration I would say that it's not the peopleand it's not the things, it's travel and experiencing different environments.

author: Wayne Newton
quote: One night I went to see Bobby at the Flamingo. Because he was my hero, I would visit him for inspiration.

author: Ben Nicholas
quote: If you wait for inspiration you'll be standing on the corner after the parade is a mile down the street.

author: Ben Nicholas
quote: Most of life is routine - dull and grubby, but routine is the momentum that keeps a man going. If you wait for inspiration you'll be standing on the corner after the parade is a mile down the street.

author: Larry Niven
quote: In general, I don't know when inspiration will pop up.

author: Alex Noble
quote: Risk is essential. There is not growth of inspiration in staying within what is safe and comfortable. Once you find out what you do best, why not try something else?

author: Rudolf Nureyev
quote: Technique is what you fall back on when you run out of inspiration.

author: Bettie Page
quote: It makes me feel wonderful that people still care for me... that I have so many fans among young people, who write to me and tell me I have been an inspiration.

author: Paracelsus
quote: Dreams are not without meaning wherever thay may come from-from fantasy, from the elements, or from other inspiration.

author: Adam Pascal
quote: You know, sometimes I get moments of inspiration when I'm writing something and then the task seems so daunting that it just kind of scares me away.

author: James Cash Penney
quote: The men who have furnished me with my greatest inspiration have not been men of wealth, but men of deeds.

author: John L. Phillips
quote: My dad served in two wars has been flying airplanes for 60 years now. He was certainly quite an inspiration.
keywords: Dad, Inspiration, Airplanes, Flying, Now, Years

author: Pablo Picasso
quote: Inspiration exists, but it has to find us working.

author: Cole Porter
quote: My sole inspiration is a telephone call from a director.

author: Giacomo Puccini
quote: Inspiration is an awakening, a quickening of all man's faculties, and it is manifested in all high artistic achievements.

author: Trevor Rabin
quote: One of the things I try to be very careful of is not taking a movie when I know I have no inspiration left.

author: Man Ray
quote: Of course, there will always be those who look only at technique, who ask 'how', while others of a more curious nature will ask 'why'. Personally, I have always preferred inspiration to information.

author: Ronald Reagan
quote: While I take inspiration from the past, like most Americans, I live for the future.

author: Buddy Rich
quote: I think at one time every drummer wanted to play like Krupa or wanted to win a Gene Krupa drum contest. This is the big inspiration for drummers and naturally it has to be the same way for me.

author: Lee Ritenour
quote: I've done a lot of albums and I kinda know when I'm onto something that was inspirational for me to record and create, and this was one of those projects where I really enjoyed making the album.

author: Tony Robbins
quote: In life you need either inspiration or desperation.

author: Smokey Robinson
quote: So I wanted to sing inspirational music, and that's exactly how I approached it - only the words have been changed to declare my relationship with God.

author: Smokey Robinson
quote: In fact, I wouldn't really call this a Gospel album, I call it more an inspirational album.

author: Smokey Robinson
quote: Had I not come out with an inspirational CD, you perhaps would have never known that I feel like I feel, that all songs, all the music I've ever done is a gift from God.

author: Alfonso G. Robles
quote: Furthermore, the Latin American nuclear-weapon free zone which is now nearing completion has become in several respects an example which, notwithstanding the different characteristics of each region, is rich in inspiration.
keywords: Inspiration, American, Completion, Example, Now, Zone

author: Sonny Rollins
quote: I think as long as people are around and can hear a record and hear people like Lester Young on a recording, there will always be a great inspiration for somebody to try to create jazz.

author: Ned Rorem
quote: Inspiration could be called inhaling the memory of an act never experienced.

author: Gavin Rossdale
quote: Wherever you look there are inspirations, books, literature, paintings, landscapes, everything. Just living is an inspiration.

author: Burt Rutan
quote: We need affordable space travel to inspire our youth, to let them know that they can experience their dreams, can set significant goals and be in a position to lead all of us to future progress in exploration, discovery and fun. Thanks to the X Prize for the inspiration.
keywords: Experience, Travel, Dreams, Inspiration, Progress, Goals, Discovery, Exploration, Fun, Future, Space

author: Grete Waitz
quote: Another inspiration that has helped me get through has been Lance Armstrong's story. My cancer is not nearly as bad as his, but I believe in staying motivated and keeping as fit as you can.

author: Grete Waitz
quote: What Fred Lebow went through was an inspiration for me. You have to set goals for yourself.

author: George Santayana
quote: The Bible is a wonderful source of inspiration for those who don't understand it.

author: Lance Secretan
quote: Science sometimes falls short when trying to fathom the depths of our essence - and our inspiration comes from that essence.

author: Amy Sedaris
quote: Books are challenging and inspirational to me.

author: Harry Seidler
quote: Architecture is not an inspirational business, it's a rational procedure to do sensible and hopefully beautiful things; that's all.

author: Connie Sellecca
quote: This was all the inspiration it took: We put 100 percent of ourselves in the lines. We personally take care of everything, from fulfillment to answering the mail.

author: Harry Shearer
quote: I am one of those people who thrive on deadlines, nothing brings on inspiration more readily than desperation.

author: Duncan Sheik
quote: Because of my Buddhist practice, I'm never lacking for inspiration.

author: Andrew Shue
quote: I have amazing friends who have led inspirational lives.

author: Michael K. Simpson
quote: I am involved with politics today because of the inspiration I received from Ronald Reagan.

author: Socrates
quote: I decided that it was not wisdom that enabled poets to write their poetry, but a kind of instinct or inspiration, such as you find in seers and prophets who deliver all their sublime messages without knowing in the least what they mean.

author: John Philip Sousa
quote: Any composer who is gloriously conscious that he is a composer must believe that he receives his inspiration from a source higher than himself.

author: Nicholas Sparks
quote: All characters come from people I know, but after the initial inspiration, I tend to modify the characters so they fit with the story.

author: Britney Spears
quote: I would like to be called an inspiration to people, not a role model - because I make mistakes like everybody else. When I'm offstage, I'm just like everybody else.

author: Benjamin Spock
quote: I would say that the surest measure of a man's or a woman's maturity is the harmony, style, joy, and dignity he creates in his marriage, and the pleasure and inspiration he provides for his spouse.
keywords: Marriage, Inspiration, Dignity, Harmony, Joy, Man, Maturity, Measure, Pleasure, Style, Woman

author: Cat Stevens
quote: Because I don't play guitar any more, African harmonies and rhythms have been an inspiration to me. I love the raw origin of the sound. It complements my voice and words naturally.
keywords: Love, Inspiration, African, Guitar, Play, Sound, Voice, Words

author: Jon Stewart
quote: Insomnia is my greatest inspiration.

author: Elvis Stojko
quote: When you're younger, your inspiration is there. As you get older, it tends to waver. Once you find it - I found it again - that's where you can draw from. That's where you draw your strength from.

author: Elvis Stojko
quote: After you've done it for so many years, you have to find a new direction. You have to find something in your soul that's going to push you towards - to find your inspiration.

author: Madeleine Stowe
quote: Part of Michael's uniqueness, I think, comes from the fact that he worked with music. He had a tape which he gave me with many different compositions, really eclectic. These pieces of music were sources of inspiration.

author: Igor Stravinsky
quote: Just as appetite comes by eating, so work brings inspiration, if inspiration is not discernible at the beginning.

author: Picabo Street
quote: I get my inspiration from everyone when I need it and how I need it.

author: Adam Schiff
quote: In fact, the converse is true: At a time when the United States has been called on for a level of moral leadership, vision and inspiration not seen since World War II, we cannot afford to dissemble about crimes against humanity.
keywords: Time, War, Leadership, Inspiration, Vision, Fact, Humanity, states, United, World, World war

author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel
quote: Many a witty inspiration is like the surprising reunion of befriended thoughts after a long separation.

author: Wislawa Szymborska
quote: Though I may deny poets their monopoly on inspiration, I still place them in a select group of Fortune's darlings.

author: Amy Tan
quote: Who knows where inspiration comes from. Perhaps it arises from desperation. Perhaps it comes from the flukes of the universe, the kindness of the muses.

author: Major Taylor
quote: I would like to cite an instance which proves the efficacy of clean living on the part of an athlete coupled with the inspiration received from a champion which go a long way to making a champion.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: Our moments of inspiration are not lost though we have no particular poem to show for them; for those experiences have left an indelible impression, and we are ever and anon reminded of them.

author: Justin Timberlake
quote: The many sounds of Memphis shaped my early musical career and continue to be an inspiration to this day.

author: Peter Tosh
quote: I travel the garden of music, thru inspiration. It's a large, very large garden, seen?

author: Mike Tyson
quote: The only thing I do is just pray for inspiration, for a way of thinking, because I don't have any particular goal in sight.

author: John Updike
quote: Inspiration arrives as a packet of material to be delivered.

author: Karl Urban
quote: That is a big danger, losing your inspiration. When I work in film and television I try to do each take a little differently. I never want to do the same thing twice, because then you're not being spontaneous, you're just recreating something.
keywords: Work, Inspiration, Being, Danger, Film, Losing, Television, Want

author: Leon Uris
quote: I have drawn inspiration from the Marine Corps, the Jewish struggle in Palestine and Israel, and the Irish.

author: Boris Vallejo
quote: There have been many different artists that have been inspirational. I suppose the question is directed to what was the reason why I went into fantasy illustration.

author: Giorgio Vasari
quote: These rough sketches, which are born in an instant in the heat of inspiration, express the idea of their author in a few strokes, while on the other hand too much effort and diligence sometimes saps the vitality and powers of those who never know when to leave off.

author: Carl Van Vechten
quote: As an inspiration to the author, I do not think the cat can be over-estimated. He suggests so much grace, power, beauty, motion, mysticism. I do not wonder that many writers love cats; I am only surprised that all do not.
keywords: Love, Beauty, Power, Inspiration, Cats, Grace, Wonder, Writers

author: Boris Vian
quote: One ends up relying on pure musical inspiration, and failing that, the music won't lead to anything good, or it will alienate all but the most die-hard fans.

author: Greg Walden
quote: A man of strength and wisdom, John Paul became an inspiration to generations of both Catholics and non-Catholics throughout the world by encouraging freedom, promoting peace and respecting all faiths.
keywords: Peace, Wisdom, Inspiration, Encouraging, Strength, Freedom, Generations, Man, World

author: Max Weinberg
quote: I will always desire to play with Bruce Springsteen. He's the most inspirational, most dedicated, most committed and most focused artist I've ever seen. I like to be around people like that.
keywords: Inspirational, People, Artist, Desire, Play, Will

author: Olivia Wilde
quote: Inspiration is the key to everything.

author: Tom Wilkinson
quote: If the script is telling the story well, that is your inspiration, and you do not need to go somewhere else.

author: Roger Williams
quote: No man ever did, nor ever shall, truly go forth to convert the nations, nor to prophesy in the present state of witnesses against Antichrist, but by the gracious inspiration and instigation of the Holy Spirit of God.
keywords: God, Inspiration, Man, Nations, Present, Spirit, State

author: John Sergeant Wise
quote: And let me tell you, you boys of America, that there is no higher inspiration to any man to be a good man, a good citizen, and a good son, brother, or father, than the knowledge that you come from honest blood.
keywords: Father, Brother, Son, Knowledge, Inspiration, America, Blood, Boys, Man

author: Carter G. Woodson
quote: Those who have no record of what their forebears have accomplished lose the inspiration which comes from the teaching of biography and history.

author: Frank Lloyd Wright
quote: Nature is my manifestation of God. I go to nature every day for inspiration in the day's work. I follow in building the principles which nature has used in its domain.
keywords: Nature, Work, God, Inspiration, Building, Day, Principles

author: Kristi Yamaguchi
quote: The past couple years training with Kurt have really brought inspiration into my skating.

author: Jack Youngblood
quote: Deacon Jones has been the most inspirational person in my football career.

author: Israel Zangwill
quote: The Past: Our cradle, not our prison; there is danger as well as appeal in its glamour. The past is for inspiration, not imitation, for continuation, not repetition.
keywords: Inspiration, Danger, Glamour, Imitation, Past, Prison, Repetition
